casebody.data:
JONES
v.
N.C. INSURANCE GUARANTY ASSOC. No. 164P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Sharon E. Dent, Charlotte, for Travelers Indemnity Company. William F. Lipscomb, Wilkesboro, for Farm Bureau Ins. Co. Joseph W. Eason, Christopher Blake, Raleigh, for NC Insurance Guaranty Assoc. G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for Peggy Jones.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of June 2004 by Defendant (Travelers Indemnity Company) for Review of the Court of Appeals' Judgment in this Case, Pursuant to Article IV, Sec. 12(1) of the NC Constitution:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
